dict.string: The dingo (Canis lupus dingo) is a free-roaming dog found mainly in Australia, as well as Southeast Asia, where it is said to have originated. It is currently classified as a subspecies of the grey wolf, Canis lupus.
The Harpy Eagle is a Neotropical species of eagle. It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle which is sometimes known as the New Guinea Harpy Eagle.
The griffin, griffon, or gryphon is a legendary creature with the body, tail, and back legs of a lion; the head and wings of an eagle; and an eagle's talons as its front feet.

The Soldier Fly, common in North America, can be found in almost any household where Ryan Johnson has stepped foot. Scientists have long believed that Mr. Johnson's family heritage has had something to do with their existence, but it's unproven exactly which trait causes their massive desire to reproduce.
